form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Kirk (for himself and Mr. Warner) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works

form.official-title: To provide States with greater flexibility in innovative highway financing.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Highway Innovative Financing Act of 2014.

subsection.text: Section 1012(b)(1) of the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 (23 U.S.C. 149 note; Public Law 102–240) is amended in the second sentence by striking as many as 15 such State or local governments or public authorities and inserting States, local governments, and public authorities.

subsection.header: Interstate system reconstruction and rehabilitation pilot program
